item.title: Why Conservatives Should Get Involved—Part 4
item.description: In part 1 of this series, we clarified some misconceptions and falsehoods about the Franklin Project. In part 2, we examined the debate on the right from 1990 with William F. Buckley and Milton Friedman. Part 3 was a critique of the Franklin Project’s Plan of Action. Today, we will look at the consequences should conservatives turn their backs on the concept of developing a service ethos in America. Generations: Saying “No” Won’t Work Do you remember when Roosevelt died?
